question: The "Loes River" is located in which country?
explanation: Loes River is located in the island country of Timor-Leste in the Lesser Sunda Islands of the Malay Archipelago. This river is one of the permanently flowing rivers in the northern part of the Timor-Leste. Lauveli River is the tributary. Loes River is the largest river in Timor-Leste in terms of the catchment area.
